markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.2**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/front-end-development/freedom-ui/creatio-devkit-common)** (8.3).

Version: 8.2

Level: advanced

`@creatio-devkit/common` library is available on an [official npm website](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@creatio-devkit/common) (`index.d.ts` file).
